data.title: A wedding of which M would approve: Daniel Craig weds Rachel Weisz in secret
data.meta_description: It was a service conducted amid such secrecy one can only assume M would have approved: the Bond actor Daniel Craig has married the actress Rachel Weisz at a private ceremony in New York State.
data.text:
It was a service conducted amid such secrecy one can only assume M would have approved: the Bond actor Daniel Craig has married the actress Rachel Weisz at a private ceremony in New York State.

Craig, 43, who is the sixth actor to play James Bond, is reported to have married the Oscar-winner Weisz, 41, last Wednesday. The only guests are believed to have been Craig’s 18-year-old daughter Ella, Weisz’s five-year-old son Henry and two family friends.

“They are madly in love and couldn’t wait to be husband and wife - but they wanted minimum fuss,” a friend of the couple said.

The clandestine wedding came on the heels of a whirlwind romance. The British actors had been friends for years but started dating only
